h3cPex.name: h3cPex

revisions.description: Initial version of this MIB module.

h3cPex.contactinfo: Platform Team H3C Technologies Co., Ltd. Haidian District Beijing P.R. China Http://www.h3c.com Zip:100085
h3cPex.description: This MIB is used to manage Port Extender (PEX) information. This MIB is applicable to products that support PEX.

h3cPexPortMinId.name: h3cPexPortMinId
h3cPexPortMinId.description: Lowest PEX port ID that can be used to uniquely identify a PEX port.

h3cPexPortMaxId.name: h3cPexPortMaxId
h3cPexPortMaxId.description: Highest PEX port ID that can be used to uniquely identify a PEX port.

h3cPexMinAssociateId.name: h3cPexMinAssociateId
h3cPexMinAssociateId.description: Lowest ID that can be assigned to a port extender (PEX).

h3cPexMaxAssociateId.name: h3cPexMaxAssociateId
h3cPexMaxAssociateId.description: Highest ID that can be assigned to a PEX.

h3cPexMaxPortPerPexPort.name: h3cPexMaxPortPerPexPort
h3cPexMaxPortPerPexPort.description: Maximum number of ports that can be bound to a PEX port.

h3cPexPortTable.name: h3cPexPortTable
h3cPexPortTable.description: This table contains objects used to configure the PEX ports.

h3cPexPortId.name: h3cPexPortId
h3cPexPortId.description: ID that can be used to uniquely identify a PEX port. The value range is h3cPexPortMinId to h3cPexPortMaxId.

h3cPexPortAssociateId.name: h3cPexPortAssociateId
h3cPexPortAssociateId.description: ID assigned to a PEX. The value range is h3cPexMinAssociateId to h3cPexMaxAssociateId. The value is 0xffff if the PEX is not assigned an ID. For a successful configuration, the ID should not be used by any other PEX.

h3cPexPortEntPhysicalIndex.name: h3cPexPortEntPhysicalIndex
h3cPexPortEntPhysicalIndex.description: Entity index of a PEX in the IRF. A value of zero indicates that the PEX is not online.

h3cPexPortDescr.name: h3cPexPortDescr
h3cPexPortDescr.description: Description for the PEX port. The default value is 'pex-port XXXX', where 'XXXX' is h3cPexPortId. Writing a zero-length string to this object resets the value to the default.

h3cPexPortStatus.name: h3cPexPortStatus
h3cPexPortStatus.description: Status of the PEX. offline: The PEX is absent or its configuration is incomplete. loading: The PEX is loading software. online: The PEX is operating correctly.

h3cPexPortRowStatus.name: h3cPexPortRowStatus
h3cPexPortRowStatus.description: The control that allows creation and deletion of entries. Values include createAndGo, active, and destroy. If the row to be created or modified already exists, an error message is returned. If the row to be deleted does not exist, a success message is returned.

h3cPexPhyPortTable.name: h3cPexPhyPortTable
h3cPexPhyPortTable.description: This table contains objects used to manage physical ports that can be bound or are already bound to a PEX port.

h3cPexPhyPortEntry.name: h3cPexPhyPortEntry
h3cPexPhyPortEntry.description: Information about a physical port that can be bound to or has been bound to a PEX port.

h3cPexPhyPortStatus.name: h3cPexPhyPortStatus
h3cPexPhyPortStatus.description: Status of the physical port that is bound to a PEX port. The following are status values: unknown: The physical port is not bound to any PEX port. down: The physical port is link down. blocked: The physical port is blocked and cannot forward traffic. forwarding: The physical port can forwarding traffic.

h3cPexPhyPortBelongToPexPort.name: h3cPexPhyPortBelongToPexPort
h3cPexPhyPortBelongToPexPort.description: ID of the PEX port to which the physical port belongs. The value range is h3cPexPortMinId to h3cPexPortMaxId. A value of zero indicates that the port doesn't belong to any PEX port.

h3cPexPhyPortNeighborEntIndex.name: h3cPexPhyPortNeighborEntIndex
h3cPexPhyPortNeighborEntIndex.description: Entity index of a physical port that connects the PEX to the parent device. This value is identical to entPhysicalIndex in ENTITY-MIB. A value of zero indicates that the physical port is not bound to any PEX port or is not up.

h3cPexPortOnline.name: h3cPexPortOnline
h3cPexPortOnline.description: An h3cPexPortOnline trap is sent when the PEX transitions to online state.

h3cPexPortOffline.name: h3cPexPortOffline
h3cPexPortOffline.description: An h3cPexPortOnline trap is sent when the PEX transitions to offline state.

h3cPexPhyPortForwarding.name: h3cPexPhyPortForwarding
h3cPexPhyPortForwarding.description: An h3cPexPhyPortForwarding trap is sent when the PEX physical port transitions to forwarding state.

h3cPexPhyPortBlocked.name: h3cPexPhyPortBlocked
h3cPexPhyPortBlocked.description: An h3cPexPhyPortBlocked trap is sent when the PEX physical port transitions from forwarding state to blocked state.

h3cPexEntPhysicalIndexBind.name: h3cPexEntPhysicalIndexBind
h3cPexEntPhysicalIndexBind.description: This index is identical to entPhysicalIndex in ENTITY-MIB.
